FuncDef:
The qos ecn enable command enables the global ECN.
The undo qos ecn enable command restores the default settings. The qos ecn enable command enables the global ECN. The undo qos ecn enable command restores the default settings. By default, the global explicit congestion advertisement function ECN is disabled. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
